description: Creates an Amazon Q Business plugin.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application that will contain the plugin.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: A the name for your plugin.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of plugin you want to create.

parameters.name: authConfiguration
parameters.description: Authentication configuration information for an Amazon Q Business plugin. basicAuthConfiguration (dict) --- Information about the basic authentication credentials used to configure a plugin. The ARN of the Secrets Manager secret that stores the basic authentication credentials used for plugin configuration.. The ARN of an IAM role used by Amazon Q Business to access the basic authentication credentials stored in a Secrets Manager secret. oAuth2ClientCredentialConfiguration (dict) --- Information about the OAuth 2.0 authentication credential/token used to configure a plugin. The ARN of the Secrets Manager secret that stores the OAuth 2.0 credentials/token used for plugin configuration. The ARN of an IAM role used by Amazon Q Business to access the OAuth 2.0 authentication credentials stored in a Secrets Manager secret. authorizationUrl (string) --- The redirect URL required by the OAuth 2.0 protocol for Amazon Q Business to authenticate a plugin user through a third party authentication server. tokenUrl (string) --- The URL required by the OAuth 2.0 protocol to exchange an end user authorization code for an access token. noAuthConfiguration (dict) --- Information about invoking a custom plugin without any authentication. idcAuthConfiguration (dict) --- Information about the IAM Identity Center Application used to configure authentication for a plugin. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM Identity Center Application used to configure authentication. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role with permissions to perform actions on Amazon Web Services services on your behalf.

nested_params.name: basicAuthConfiguration
nested_params.description: Information about the basic authentication credentials used to configure a plugin.

nested_params.name: secretArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the Secrets Manager secret that stores the basic authentication credentials used for plugin configuration..

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of an IAM role used by Amazon Q Business to access the basic authentication credentials stored in a Secrets Manager secret.

nested_params.name: oAuth2ClientCredentialConfiguration
nested_params.description: Information about the OAuth 2.0 authentication credential/token used to configure a plugin.

nested_params.name: secretArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the Secrets Manager secret that stores the OAuth 2.0 credentials/token used for plugin configuration.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of an IAM role used by Amazon Q Business to access the OAuth 2.0 authentication credentials stored in a Secrets Manager secret.

nested_params.name: authorizationUrl
nested_params.description: The redirect URL required by the OAuth 2.0 protocol for Amazon Q Business to authenticate a plugin user through a third party authentication server.

nested_params.name: tokenUrl
nested_params.description: The URL required by the OAuth 2.0 protocol to exchange an end user authorization code for an access token.

nested_params.name: noAuthConfiguration
nested_params.description: Information about invoking a custom plugin without any authentication.

nested_params.name: idcAuthConfiguration
nested_params.description: Information about the IAM Identity Center Application used to configure authentication for a plugin.

nested_params.name: idcApplicationArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM Identity Center Application used to configure authentication.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role with permissions to perform actions on Amazon Web Services services on your behalf.

parameters.name: customPluginConfiguration
parameters.description: Contains configuration for a custom plugin. A description for your custom plugin configuration. The type of OpenAPI schema to use. apiSchema (dict) --- Contains either details about the S3 object containing the OpenAPI schema for the action group or the JSON or YAML-formatted payload defining the schema. payload (string) --- The JSON or YAML-formatted payload defining the OpenAPI schema for a custom plugin. s3 (dict) --- Contains details about the S3 object containing the OpenAPI schema for a custom plugin. The schema could be in either JSON or YAML format. The name of the S3 bucket that contains the file. The name of the file.

nested_params.name: description
nested_params.description: A description for your custom plugin configuration.

nested_params.name: apiSchemaType
nested_params.description: The type of OpenAPI schema to use.

nested_params.name: apiSchema
nested_params.description: Contains either details about the S3 object containing the OpenAPI schema for the action group or the JSON or YAML-formatted payload defining the schema.

nested_params.name: payload
nested_params.description: The JSON or YAML-formatted payload defining the OpenAPI schema for a custom plugin.

nested_params.name: s3
nested_params.description: Contains details about the S3 object containing the OpenAPI schema for a custom plugin. The schema could be in either JSON or YAML format.

nested_params.name: bucket
nested_params.description: The name of the S3 bucket that contains the file.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The name of the file.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pairs that identify or categorize the data source connector. You can also use tags to help control access to the data source connector. Tag keys and values can consist of Unicode letters, digits, white space, and any of the following symbols: _ . : / = + - @. (dict) --- A list of key/value pairs that identify an index, FAQ, or data source. The key for the tag. Keys are not case sensitive and must be unique for the Amazon Q Business application or data source. The value associated with the tag. The value may be an empty string but it can't be null.

nested_params.name: key
nested_params.description: The key for the tag. Keys are not case sensitive and must be unique for the Amazon Q Business application or data source.

nested_params.name: value
nested_params.description: The value associated with the tag. The value may be an empty string but it can't be null.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that you provide to identify the request to create your Amazon Q Business plugin. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: pluginId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the plugin created.

nested_items.name: pluginArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a plugin.

nested_items.name: buildStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of a plugin. A plugin is modified asynchronously.
